title: Optimized deep learning models for effluent prediction in wastewater treatment processes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00875D, Paper
Canyun Yang, Zhuoyue Guo, Yun Geng, Fengshan Zhang, Wenguang Wei, Hongbin Liu
Aiming at prediction of water quality in wastewater treatment systems, an optimized deep learning model with high prediction performance is proposed.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
